org.apache.flink.formats.avro

类 AvroRowSerializationSchema

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.formats.avro.AvroRowSerializationSchema
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, SerializationSchema<Row>

    public class AvroRowSerializationSchema
extends java.lang.Object
implements SerializationSchema<Row>
    Serialization schema that serializes Row over SpecificRecord into a Avro bytes.
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

      Avro serialization schema.

      • AvroRowSerializationSchema

        public AvroRowSerializationSchema(java.lang.Class<? extends org.apache.avro.specific.SpecificRecord> recordClazz)
        Creates a Avro serialization schema for the given schema.
        参数:
        recordClazz - Avro record class used to deserialize Avro's record to Flink's row

      • convertToRecord

        private static java.lang.Object convertToRecord(org.apache.avro.Schema schema,
                                                java.lang.Object rowObj)
        Converts a (nested) Flink Row into Avro's GenericRecord. Strings are converted into Avro's Utf8 fields.
